mapper.insert: insert into cs_notc (BBSO_NO, TTL, CN, WRTD, WRTR, CATE, FST_REGR, LAST_UPDR, USE_YN) VALUES (#{BBSO_NO}, #{TTL},#{CN}, #{WRTD},#{WRTR}, #{CATE}, #{FST_REGR}, #{LAST_UPDR}, #{USE_YN})
mapper.select: select * from cs_notc order by BBSO_NO desc, WRTD desc
select * from cs_notc order by BBSO_NO DESC, WRTD DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}

select count(*) from cs_notc where true
AND TTL LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
